statements: ALTER TABLE strategy ADD COLUMN start_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE trade ADD COLUMN position_size DECIMAL(10,2);
ALTER TABLE performance ADD COLUMN sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(10,2);
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE stocks ADD COLUMN stock_quantity INT NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE orders ADD COLUMN order_date DATE NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE algo_trading.stocks ADD COLUMN new_column1 INT;
ALTER TABLE algo_trading.portfolio DROP COLUMN symbol;
ALTER TABLE algo_trading.trades MODIFY COLUMN quantity FLOAT;
